test_name: QQ Music Search I Love You China

test_scenario.objective: Search for the song 'I Love You China' in QQ Music app and verify that the search function can correctly find and display related songs
test_scenario.description: Use search function to find the song 'I Love You China'
test_scenario.expected_result: Successfully search for the song 'I Love You China' and be able to click to play, verifying that the search function works normally
